district_tag.internal_notes: The city center and the secondary civic hub, both of which have very tall buildings.
All the things where people live and work, not the stuff in the AbnormalDistrict set.
Regular citizens or homeless can sneak into these without being shot, or just walk in.
It's not appropriate for the regular citizens or homeless to show up here.
The slums and the decrepit part of town.
The basic, industrial, and commercial areas, which are all flavors of midrise buildings.
The below districts, which are all ones that work pretty differently from the norm.
